content.question: Which of the following best explains the mechanism behind the change in beak size in the finch population?

choices.label: The formation of two new finch species from a single parent species
A change in gene frequencies in the finch population due to selective pressure from the environmental change
A new allele appearing in the finch population as a result of mutation
The achievement of dynamic equilibrium in the finch population as a result of homeostasis

content.answer: A change in gene frequencies in the finch population due to selective pressure from the environmental change
